section.docs:
This API is for reporting errors in offical Radium products. If you are not a Radium developer, you cannot use this API. This request is different from the others because it only returns a `HEAD` response. The reports are sent to an external system for tracking and resolving.
title
Required
A succinct description of the problem.
what_happened
Required
A longer description of what the problem actually is.
steps_to_repoduce
Required
How the bug is triggered
project_id
Required
Corresponds to a Radium product.
notes
Any other information that may help with this bug
screenshot
File may be uploaded as well
section.reference:
`POST https://api.radiumcrm.com/bugs`
### Parameters
```javascript { "developer_api_key" => "foo", "user_api_key" => "bar", "bug" => { "title": "Short description", "what_happened": "Call did not sync", "expected_result": "For the call to sync" "steps_to_reproduce": "Call someone on a Nokia phone" "project_id": 1 } } ````
